name: Waterside Chirping 水畔空蝉
description:
Main story:
The game protagonist, Aileen, was an ordinary village girl. One day, she suddenly fall asleep for a whole day. Nobody can wake her up. However, when everyone in the village gave up on her, she raised up. Nobody know what happened on her, not even herself. After this incident, various of strange things appeared …

How to play:
This is a vision Novel type of game, no in-game choice with an inventory system. Gaming time : 1 hour. Two endings.

Ohter:
This is a yuri game
